title: AI Agent Interface Schema
description: Defines the input parameters and expected output structure for AI agent invocation.

input.description: Parameters passed to the AI agent for content generation.

taskDescription.description: A detailed description of the task for the AI agent to perform.

context.description: Additional context or reference material for the AI agent (e.g., relevant sections from spec.md or plan.md).

wordCountTarget.description: An optional target for the length of the generated content.

output.description: Expected output structure from the AI agent.

generatedContent.description: The content generated by the AI agent.

wordCount.description: The actual word count of the generated content.

success.description: Indicates if the AI agent successfully generated content.

errorMessage.description: Error message if content generation failed.
